column4: hello, the package manager is bothering me with an "update" of firefox to 1.0.8, i have however the 1.5.0.2 (in Breezy). How to make it STOP asking for updates for a specific app (in this case firefox)?
Just go ahead and install it. It won't overwrite your 1.5.0.2 install.
If you followed those instructions already, then just install the update you're being prompted to install.
